skins.shipDescription: South Dakota-class battleship ¨C South Dakota, Hull Number BB-57!
skins.selfIntroduction: Battleship of Eagle Union, South Dakota. When it comes to battlefields, I wish for you to not leave my side. I will protect you, Commander. 'The Strongest Shield'? Vain titles are worthless. There's meaning only in being useful.
skins.acquisition: I am South Dakota, Commander. I shall become your shield and protect you from all cannon fire.
skins.secretaryIdle1: In the darkness, my will was tempered. I fear nothing.
skins.secretaryIdle2: As long as I am of use to Commander, I am fine with handing my credit over to others.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Those who stand as Commander's enemies, are enemies all the same.
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm ready to move out anytime.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If this is what you want to do...

skins.shipDescription: Massachusetts suggested I learn something useful that's unrelated to combat, so I started playing the piano... It seemed impossible at first, but after actually trying it, I've developed a pretty good feel for it.
skins.acquisition: Massachusetts suggested I learn something useful that's unrelated to combat, so I started playing the piano... It seemed impossible at first, but after actually trying it, I've developed a pretty good feel for it.
skins.login: What song should I play for you today...
skins.details: Aurora asked me to perform with her... I guess it can't hurt to try.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I can't get used to this flimsy dress. I'd rather wear my regular clothes...
skins.secretaryIdle2: My cat goes for the keyboard when I'm not playing... Do you want to practice the piano too, kitty?
skins.secretaryIdle3: We can express so much through music. I suppose that's fitting for someone bad at expressing their feelings like I am.
